alert.note: Alert for Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 09 at 6:52PM EDT until July 09 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following counties, Schuyler, Seneca and Yates. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dundee, Hector, Starkey, Tyrone, Ovid, Interlaken, Lodi, Lakemont, Himrod, Glenora, Rock Stream, Caywood, Reading Center, Lodi Station, Porter Corner, Willard, Townsendville, Wayne, Bradford and Lodi Point State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
